doc:
Galen Gering https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galen_Gering 0 Galen Laius Gering (born February 13, 1971) is an American actor most known for his portrayal of characters on daytime soap operas. He plays the role of Rafe Hernandez on the long-running NBC soap opera Days of Our Lives. Prior to his current role, he acted on the NBC daytime soap opera Passions as Luis Lopez-Fitzgerald. Galen_Laius_Gering ( born February_13 , 1971 ) is an_American_actor most_known for his_portrayal of characters on daytime_soap_operas . He plays the_role of Rafe_Hernandez on the_long-running_NBC_soap_opera_Days of Our_Lives . Prior to his_current_role , he acted on the_NBC_daytime_soap_opera_Passions as Luis_Lopez-Fitzgerald .
